alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:34PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Salle and north central Webb Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Encinal, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cotulla, Encinal, Artesia Wells and Chaparral Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 31 and 69. US Highway 83 between mile markers 682 and 684. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
